title: Strategies for Enhancing Exhibition Learning Effects Using Digital Learning Sheets

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learner role: Student/Job seeker, Domain expertise: Beginner, Subject/Job field: Social Studies, Delivery method: LMS-based video and worksheet provision, Assessment method: Project-based assessment, Technology environment: Tablet/PC provided

learning_goals: Learners can design digital learning sheets linked to exhibition content according to design principles (inquiry, interaction, physical object sensibility).
Learners can analyze the impact of digital learning sheets on learning motivation (attention, relevance, confidence, satisfaction) and write a report.
Learners can apply topic-optimized digital learning sheets (e.g., woodworking art) and evaluate learning outcomes (cognitive, affective, psychomotor domains).

resources: Virtual Exhibition Materials for Woodworking Art

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
